entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:17 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 8:17 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
